idea-plugin.name: Base16 Spacemacs
idea-plugin.vendor: Nasser Alshammari (https://github.com/nashamri/spacemacs-theme), Shirom Makkad, and the Base16 project
idea-plugin.description:
Base 16 Spacemacs for Jetbrains IDE


---------------


Colors by Nasser Alshammari (https://github.com/nashamri/spacemacs-theme). Theme made using base16(https://github.com/chriskempson/base16). Theme generated by Shirom Makkad (https://github.com/ShiromMakkad/base16-jetbrains-ide)
